title: A question about ranked
body: So I was plat 4 and my friend was silver 4 if we play together during the placements will I get placed lower then because my friends have been saying that and i don't know if its true.

replies.body:
Mmmmmmm I'm honestly not sure you'd even be *able* to queue for placements together with those ranks tbh. AFAIK, you'll still be held to the [**queue requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q1) listed here....

https://i.gyazo.com/a255dda444a5da2f63e938b179a7e423.png

I think that in placements can you play with whoever you want to but after that can't i play with him if we get in the same rank or one tier wich is low but still. If i play with him will i get placed lower or if i played with a plat player or is this just something that is incorrect.
